org.sakaiproject.taggable.api

Interface LinkManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LinkManagerImpl

    public interface LinkManager

      • lookupLink

        Link lookupLink(List<Link> links,
              String tagCriteriaRef)
        Search a given list of links for one containing this tagCriteria
        Parameters:
        links -
        tagCriteriaRef -
        Returns:

      • persistLink

        Link persistLink(String activityRef,
               String tagCriteriaRef,
               String rationale,
               String rubric,
               boolean visible,
               boolean locked)
        Method to add a new link.
        Parameters:
        activityRef - A reference for the activity from which this link is being created.
        tagCriteriaRef - The tagCriteriaRef to which this link is being created.
        rationale - The rationale for creating this link.
        rubric - Some rubric value.
        visible - True if this link should be made visible to those with appropriate permissions, false otherwise.
        locked - True if this link should be locked, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        The link that has been added.

      • getLink

        Link getLink(String ref)
             throws IdUnusedException,
                    PermissionException
        Method to get a link uniquely identified by the given reference.
        Parameters:
        ref - The link's reference.
        Returns:
        The link that matches the given reference.
        Throws:
        IdUnusedException - Exception thrown if the id from the reference doesn't match any records.
        PermissionException - Exception thrown if current user doesn't have permission to perform this action.

      • getLink

        Link getLink(String activityRef,
           String tagCriteriaRef)
             throws PermissionException
        Method to get the link between the activity identified by the given reference and the given tagCriteria.
        Parameters:
        activityRef - A reference for the activity to which this link is being created.
        tagCriteriaRef - The tagCriteriaRef to search for.
        Returns:
        The matching link.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - Exception thrown if current user doesn't have permission to perform this action.

      • getLinks

        List<Link> getLinks(String activityRef,
                  boolean any,
                  String toContext)
                    throws PermissionException
        Method to get a list of links to the activity identified by the given activity reference.
        Parameters:
        activityRef - A reference for the activity from which the links have been created.
        any - True to return all links, false to return only visible links.
        toContext - The context containing the criteria to which the links to be viewed have been created.
        Returns:
        A list of links.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - Exception thrown if current user doesn't have permission to perform this action.

      • getLinks

        List<Link> getLinks(String criteriaRef,
                  boolean any)
                    throws PermissionException
        Method to get a list of links to the criteria ref
        Parameters:
        criteriaRef - The tagCriteriaRef to search for.
        any - True to return all links, false to return only visible links.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        PermissionException

      • removeLink

        void removeLink(Link link)
        Method to remove individual links
        Parameters:
        link - The link to remove.

      • removeLinks

        void removeLinks(String activityRef)
        Method to remove all links for a specific activity
        Parameters:
        activityRef - The activity's reference
